dateline.name:
431 Stevens st.
cor West.
Camden,
N. Jersey.

body.p: Please furnish me with Copyright for "Two Rivulets," as per title enclosed. Is the $1 the right sum?

postscript.p: If perfectly convenient—& you have a printed slip with Copyright laws, (latest) please enclose with document.
